title: Client keeps making my computer crash (Windows 7)
body:
These past few days I've been trying to play some games with my friends and I began to that crashing in the middle of the game. The first time it happened was when everyone starting hitting past level 6. It caused us to lose because I couldn't get back in time to help. I figured it wasn't a big deal so we went to play another and it crashed earlier than last time. I was in the bottom lane around level 4. I re-logged and it happened within seconds. Then it happened again, and again, and again. (we somehow won) 

I tried to fix it with the launch page repair option and tested it in a custom game. I crashes around the 3 minute point every single time despite me repairing the client. 

The crash I get isn't a bluescreen ether. It's more like my computer forces itself to restart on me. 

Someone please help{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
